title: Need a Senior Java Developer with Enterprise Experience
description: Writing JavaScript code. Converting design mock-ups into code. Working with libraries such as Sigma, Git, CSS, Adobe XD, etc. Creating a web interface according to the client's preferences.our primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React. js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain.
